And I live on a farm
There are many plants in my farm!
I love to read about these plants
. I know the names of the plants
, and I know how to use them
We can make medicine from the flowers and the leaves.
. One day a man comes to the farm
Hello. How can I help you?
Many people in my town are sick
We don’t have a doctor and there is no medicine for them.
Is there a plant here that can help them?
